CHECK_TITLE: Avoid the use of the root account
RESOURCE_DETAILS: Root account usage detected in last 7 days
RISK: The root account has full access to your AWS resources. Using it for daily tasks is a security risk.
REMEDIATION_RECOMMENDATION: Avoid using the root account for daily tasks.

CHECK_TITLE: Ensure multi-factor authentication (MFA) is enabled for all IAM users that have a console password
RISK: MFA adds an extra layer of protection on top of your user name and password.
REMEDIATION_RECOMMENDATION: Enable MFA for all users with console access.

CHECK_TITLE: Ensure credentials unused for 90 days or greater are disabled
RISK: Unused credentials increase the attack surface.

CHECK_TITLE: Ensure CloudTrail is enabled in all regions
RESOURCE_DETAILS: Trail not enabled in all regions
RISK: CloudTrail provides a history of AWS API calls for your account.

CHECK_TITLE: Ensure CloudTrail log file validation is enabled
RISK: Log file validation ensures the integrity of CloudTrail logs.

CHECK_TITLE: Ensure the S3 bucket used to store CloudTrail logs is not publicly accessible
RISK: Public CloudTrail logs can expose sensitive information.
REMEDIATION_RECOMMENDATION: Ensure the S3 bucket is private.

CHECK_TITLE: Ensure no security groups allow ingress from 0.0.0.0/0 to port 22
RISK: Open SSH port allows brute force attacks.

CHECK_TITLE: Ensure no security groups allow ingress from 0.0.0.0/0 to port 3389
RISK: Open RDP port allows brute force attacks.

CHECK_TITLE: Ensure the default security group of every VPC restricts all traffic
RISK: Default security groups should not allow traffic.
REMEDIATION_RECOMMENDATION: Restrict all traffic in default SG.

CHECK_TITLE: Install and maintain a firewall configuration to protect cardholder data
RISK: Firewalls are essential for network security.

REMEDIATION_RECOMMENDATION: Encrypt personal data at rest and in transit.
